channel.title: carrot on Flo's Food and Drink
channel.description: Recent content in carrot on Flo's Food and Drink

item.title: Cath's Carrot Cake & Frosting
item.description: Carrot cake ingredients 2 cups of sugar 1 ½ cups of vegetable oil (NOT olive oil!) 3 eggs 2 teaspoons of Vanilla Essence 2 ¼ cups of Self-raising flour 2 teaspoons of Ground Cinnamon 2 teaspoons of Baking Soda 1 teaspoon of Salt 2 cups of shredded Carrot 2 cups of flaked Coconut 18 oz can of crushed Pineapple (drained) 1 cup of chopped Walnuts (try some Sultanas) Method

item.title: Carrot Cake
item.description: Ingredients 2 cups sugar 1 1/2 cups veg. oil (not olive oil) 3 eggs 2 1/4 self-raising flour 2 teaspoons vanilla essence 2 teaspoons cinnamon 2 teaspoons bread soda 1 teaspoon salt 2 cups of shredded carrot 2 cups flaked coconut 18 ozs can crushed pineapples drained 1 cup chopped walnuts Method Combine sugar, eggs and oil & vanilla in a bowl. Stir in flour, cinnamon, soda & salt - mix well.
